resources.string: We\'ve noticed you don\'t have an account on this phone. Please select one of the following and then you can start sharing pictures with your friends:
Create a new account with user name
Create new account without a user name

Please enter your name, your phone number(s) (separated by commas if multiple numbers), and your email address(es) (separated by commas if multiple addresses).

This information is required so others know who you are when you add them to groups.

Some information may already be filled in that was read from your address book.
Entering personal info canceled.\nRegistration not completed.\nPlease select an option.
All fields must have a value. Please try again.
"Pick a group to add to list"
"Pick a group to add picture to"
